name: Merging Worlds
description:
DISCLAIMER  : WebGL build doesn't work ... Please download the game instead.

In merging worlds you are a husband trying to save his wife that has been kidnapped in order to marry the wrong one. 

Commands :

  • WASD or directional keys to move
  • Space to jump

Art, level design and implementation by PixTrick

Music and SFX by Pablo Del Pino
